attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned want the Prime Minister to reduce the amount of British taxes that are used in international develop.

This money should be used to lower our exposure to the recession and to reduce the amount that we must borrow in debt.

Due to the Prime Ministers lack of ability to foresee this recession and take action against it, Britain requires all available funds to be used in conjunction with current projects to stimulate the economy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
